cards.name: Leonardo da Vinci
cards.text:
{3}{U}{U}: Until end of turn, Thopters you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
{2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If the discarded card was an artifact card, exile it from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 0/2 Thopter artifact creature with flying in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Ezio Auditore da Firenze
cards.text:
Menace
Assassin spells you cast have freerunning {B}{B}. (You may cast a spell for its freerunning cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with an Assassin or commander.)
Whenever Ezio deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} if that player has 10 or less life. When you do, that player loses the game.

cards.name: Alta√Ør Ibn-La'Ahad
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Alta√Ør Ibn-La'Ahad attacks, exile up to one target Assassin creature card from your graveyard with a memory counter on it. Then for each creature card you own in exile with a memory counter on it, create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of it. Exile those tokens at end of combat.

cards.name: Cleopatra, Exiled Pharaoh
cards.text:
Allies ‚Äî At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target legendary creatures.
Betrayal ‚Äî Whenever a legendary creature with counters on it dies, draw a card for each counter on it. You lose 2 life.

cards.name: The Animus
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target legendary creature card from a graveyard with a memory counter on it.
{T}: Until your next turn, target legendary creature you control becomes a copy of target creature card in exile with a memory counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Hidden Blade
cards.text:
Flash
When Hidden Blade enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control. If that creature is an Assassin, it gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
Equip {2}

cards.flavorText:
"I do not wish to speak with you, but through you. You are the prophet. You've played your part."
‚ÄîMinerva
cards.name: Temporal Trespass

rulings.text: Because delve isn‚Äôt an alternative cost, it can be used in conjunction with alternative costs.
Delve doesn‚Äôt change a spell‚Äôs mana cost or converted mana cost. For example, the converted mana cost of Tasigur‚Äôs Cruelty (with mana cost {5}{B}) is 6 even if you exile three cards to cast it.
You can‚Äôt exile cards to pay for the colored mana requirements of a spell with delve.
You can‚Äôt exile more cards than the generic mana requirement of a spell with delve. For example, you can‚Äôt exile more than five cards from your graveyard to cast Tasigur‚Äôs Cruelty.
You exile cards from your graveyard at the same time you pay the spell‚Äôs cost. Exiling a card this way is simply another way to pay that cost.

cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Trespass.

cards.flavorText: An Assassin has no weapon as deadly and no ally as dependable as the shroud of night.
cards.name: Cover of Darkness
cards.text:
As Cover of Darkness enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type have fear. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

cards.name: Sword of Feast and Famine

rulings.text: You can tap your lands for mana while the triggered ability is on the stack. However, you'll lose any mana you produce this way if you don't spend it before the end of the current combat damage step.
You'll untap all lands you control even if the player can't discard a card.
